fullContent: Homeâ€º RacingHover Racer ProBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHover Racer Pro is a 3D racing game where the player steers a hover ship in a map full of jumping ramps. This ship can go almost as fast as an airplane. You must become an expert at driving it. Otherwise, it can easily get out of control. Perform jumps with your vehicle on the map's ramps. Create different gaming experiences for yourself by trying different moves with your ship in this hover game.How to Play Hover Racer ProThere is a map in the game. And this map is full of different platforms. You can try different moves with your ship on these platforms. Push the limits by testing how fast your ship can reach. Your ship also has a booster feature. You can even race a plane using this!Hover ShipsYou have 6 different hover options. All of them are in different shapes and colors. Try each one one by one and choose your favorite. Our favorite is green vehicle number 5. Every hover has a booster. Using this, you can increase the speed of vehicles up to 800 km/h.Pink Areas on the MapThe red bar at the bottom right of the game screen shows the health of the vehicle, and the blue bar shows the booster power. Your vehicle may be damaged. Your booster also decreases as you use it. You need to refill it. You can fill both of these bars by hovering over the pink bar on the map.Your Options in the Hover Racer ProIn the game, you can make decisions about how you want to play your game. You have some options. You can determine your own game settings from the Options section. You can open the Options menu by pressing the double line icon on the right side of the screen.If you wish, you can remove the health limitation of your vehicle from here.You can use your booster and your vehicle's health bar as a single bar.Instead of going to the pink area and filling the booster bar, you can have it fill automatically by selecting the "Auto Boost Regeneration" option.ControlsTo steer the ship, use the WASD or the Arrow keys.To use the booster, press the Left-shift key.Press the Space key to use the brake.What is More?If you like playing Hover Racer Pro, you may also like the first game of the series, Hover Racer. In this sci-fi-themed 3D racing game, you take control of a hover. You'll get a whole new kind of gaming experience with this game. The autos were put on hold. It's all about hovers now.Or, you may look up other flying games on OnlineGames.io for more options.
